name: Special Sorting
description:
In Special Sorting, you have to put in their area 3 type of bombs which come out from the factory, if you are too slow they will explode ! So be fast and don't mess up. Also, don't move them to fast or they won't grip.

Every second, the bombs arrive faster and faster, so you have to sort them out as quickly and as long as possible to avoid exploding everything!

RULES :  A bomb comes out ->Put it in the correct areaA bomb isn't sorted for 3s ->Everything is gonna explode ! CONTROLS :  Place a bomb ->hold down the mouse on itRestart after a loose ->Click the restart button GAME :

Special Sorting is a remake of a mini-game from the DS version of Mario 64. I didn't use any music or asset from the original game. 

Share your highscores in the comment section !

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa.

The music was made by xxxxxxxxxx.
